original_text: And the sockets for the pillars were of brass; the hooks of the pillars and their fillets of silver; and the overlaying of their chapiters of silver; and all the pillars of the court were filleted with silver.
korean_text: 기둥 받침은 놋이요 기둥의 갈고리와 가름대는 은이요 기둥 머리 싸개는 은이며 뜰의 모든 기둥에 은 가름대를 꿰었으며

sentences.original_text: And the sockets for the pillars were of brass
the hooks of the pillars were of silver
and the overlaying of their chapiters of silver
and all the pillars of the court were filleted with silver
